channel.title: [508] Team viewer please? adding this yell command it aint working [508]
channel.description:
Alright, thanks to Davidi2, for making me a yell command, but theres one small problem some reason i get errors while i do this could somone maybe team viewer with me and add this in :( ? Thankkkkks <3
EDIT: i know im a little noobie at this kinda stuff but, it takes practise to get as far as most of you on this Moparscape, And i thank you guys for taking the time to help me and any other new coming coders! :)

item.title: [508] Team viewer please? adding this yell command it aint working [508]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

else if (cmd[0].equals("yell")) { if (p.muted == 0) { String message = command.substring(5); String titles = "<col=347C17>[User] " + p.username; switch(p.rights) { case 1: titles = "<img=0><col=153EBF>[Moderator] " + p.username + "<shad=3BB9FF>"; break; case 2: titles = "<img=1><col=C35617>[Administrator] " + p.username; break; case 3: titles = "<img=1><col=C35617>[Owner] " + p.username + "<shad=FBB117>"; break; } for(Player pl : Main.getEngine().getPlayers()){ if(pl != null) { pl.getFrames().sendMessage(titles + ": " +message); } } } else { p.getFrames().sendMessage("You have been muted for breaking the rules."); } }
